name: Cover page status pills
description:
Using variants, I've created a trio of styles for your cover page statuses.


These are great for giving an indication of where in the design process your files are.


Statuses included:

  • In progress
  • In review
  • Approved
  • In development
  • Shipped
  • Blocked


Styles included

  • Squared
  • Lozenge
  • Candy
